entries.name: asset_dirs
entries.desc: Maps an asset type to its path on the filesystem

entries.name: options
entries.desc: An RDoc::Options instance used for rendering options

entries.name: new(server, stores, cache, mount_path = nil, extra_doc_dirs = [])
asset(generator_name, req, res)
entries.desc: Serves the asset at the path in req for generator_name via res.

entries.name: do_GET(req, res)
entries.desc: GET request entry point.  Fills in res for the path, etc. in req.

entries.name: documentation_page(store, generator, path, req, res)
entries.desc: Fills in res with the class, module or page for req from store.

entries.name: documentation_search(store, generator, req, res)
entries.desc: Creates the JSON search index on res for the given store.  generator must respond to #json_index to build.  req is ignored.

entries.name: documentation_source(path)
entries.desc: Returns the RDoc::Store and path relative to mount_path for documentation at path.

entries.name: error(exception, req, res)
entries.desc: Generates an error page for the exception while handling req on res.

entries.name: generator_for(store)
entries.desc: Instantiates a Darkfish generator for store

entries.name: if_modified_since(req, res, path = nil)
entries.desc: Handles the If-Modified-Since HTTP header on req for path.  If the file has not been modified a Not Modified response is returned.  If the file has been modified a Last-Modified header is added to res.

entries.name: installed_docs()
entries.desc: Returns an Array of installed documentation.

entries.name: not_found(generator, req, res, message = nil)
entries.desc: Returns a 404 page built by generator for req on res.

entries.name: ri_paths(&block)
entries.desc: Enumerates the ri paths.  See RDoc::RI::Paths#each

entries.name: root(req, res)
entries.desc: Generates the root page on res.  req is ignored.

entries.name: root_search(req, res)
entries.desc: Generates a search index for the root page on res.  req is ignored.

entries.name: show_documentation(req, res)
entries.desc: Displays documentation for req on res, whether that be HTML or some asset.

entries.name: store_for(source_name)
entries.desc: Returns an RDoc::Store for the given source_name ('ruby' or a gem name).
